Course Description: THIS COURSE FOCUSES ON INDEPENDENT AUDITING IN THE PRIVATE SECTOR AS IT RELATES TO GENERALLY ACCEPTED AUDITING STANDARDS (GAAS). EMPHASIS IS ON THE AUDITOR’S ROLE, AICPA-CODE OF PROFESSIONAL CONDUCT, AUDITING STANDARDS, EVIDENCE AND PROCEDURES. THIS COURSE INCLUDES AN AUDITING AND ATTESTATION COMPREHENSIVE EXAM. THIS COURSE MUST BE COMPLETED AT HODGES UNIVERSITY.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
